<template>
  <div class="ScreenAdapter"
       :style="style">
    <slot />
  </div>
</template>

<script>
export default {
  components: {},
  props: {
    width: {
      type: String,
      default: "1920",
    },
    height: {
      type: String,
      default: "1080",
    },
  },
  data () {
    return {
      style: {
        width: this.width + "px",
        height: this.height + "px",
        transform: "scale(1) translate(-50%, -50%)",
      },
    };
  },
  watch: {},
  computed: {},
  created () { },
  mounted () {
    this.setScale();
    window.onresize = this.Debounce(this.setScale, 1000);
  },
  methods: {
    Debounce: (fn, t) => {
      const delay = t || 500;
      let timer;
      return function () {
        const args = arguments;
        if (timer) {
          clearTimeout(timer);
        }
        const context = this;
        timer = setTimeout(() => {
          timer = null;
          fn.apply(context, args);
        }, delay);
      };
    },
    // è·å–æ”¾å¤§ç¼©å°æ¯”ä¾‹
    getScale () {
      const w = window.innerWidth / this.width;
      const h = window.innerHeight / this.height;
      return w < h ? w : h;
    },
    // è®¾ç½®æ¯”ä¾‹
    setScale () {
      this.style.transform =
        "scale(" + this.getScale() + ") translate(-50%, -50%)";
    },
  },
  beforeDestroy () {
    window.onresize = null;
    window.removeEventListener("resize", this.Debounce(this.setScale, 1000));
  }
};
</script>
<style scoped>
.ScreenAdapter {
  height: 100%;
  transform-origin: 0 0;
  position: absolute;
  left: 50%;
  top: 50%;
  transition: 0.3s;
}
</style>
